title: Princess Shu - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Aristocracy   Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Caring Protagonist   European Ambience   Fated Lovers   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Marriage   Nobles   R-18   Royalty   Saints   Second Chance   Smart Couple   Tomboyish Female Lead
author: Flowing Honey   Honey Dripping   Honey Flows   꿀이흐르는
description:
Valia—born a daughter of a knight in a fallen aristocratic family—lived a sad life.
Then, she was given a second chance.

‘Should I live like that again?’

No, I don’t want to!

Valia decided to become the temple princess to live a happier life, without worrying about money.

And as the temple princess, she became the wife of Schuden, the most handsome and the greatest noble in the Empire…!

But in the future, Schuden will fall in love with a saintess from another world. Valia knew about that, but she could not get away from Schuden, who thought she’s adorable!

Schuden’s temple princess, Valia. What’s her fate?

“I will love only him…Throughout my life. If I break my vow…I will pay it back with my life.”>
